critiques.subject: two construction workers on a high-rise window-washing/rigging platform with an American flag and city buildings behind
improvements: [SIGNIFICANT] Reduce heavy compression artifacts/pixelation by exporting from a higher-quality source if available; if not, apply targeted noise reduction plus mild JPEG artifact reduction (e.g., Lightroom Denoise/Detail smoothing) and avoid aggressive sharpening
[MODERATE] Rebalance tonality: lower highlights (~-20 to -35) on the bright building, lift shadows slightly on the workers/platform (+10 to +25), and add a gentle midtone contrast S-curve
[SUBTLE] Warm the white balance slightly (increase Temp a bit and reduce cyan/blue in shadows with Color Grading or HSL) while keeping neutrals neutral

[MODERATE] Crop/straighten to strengthen composition: trim some top background and right edge to reduce distraction, keep the flag and workers as the primary visual anchors, and ensure verticals feel intentional
[SUBTLE] Apply selective sharpening/texture on the workers only (masking): add slight Texture/Clarity (+5 to +15) and sharpening with masking, while keeping the background smoother
preserve: the strong color accent and symbolism of the American flag
critiques.notes: The scene has strong narrative content and a compelling juxtaposition of workers against dense urban architecture. The main limitation is severe compression/pixelation that obscures detail; after addressing that, modest tonal and color balancing plus a tighter crop will better emphasize the subjects.

improvements_detailed.action: Reduce heavy compression artifacts/pixelation by exporting from a higher-quality source if available; if not, apply targeted noise reduction plus mild JPEG artifact reduction (e.g., Lightroom Denoise/Detail smoothing) and avoid aggressive sharpening
improvements_detailed.reason: The blocky mosaic artifacts dominate fine detail (faces, buildings) and reduce perceived sharpness; cleanup will materially improve clarity and print/zoom quality.

improvements_detailed.action: Rebalance tonality: lower highlights (~-20 to -35) on the bright building, lift shadows slightly on the workers/platform (+10 to +25), and add a gentle midtone contrast S-curve
improvements_detailed.reason: Helps separate the subjects from the bright background and restores depth without making the scene look artificially HDR.

improvements_detailed.action: Warm the white balance slightly (increase Temp a bit and reduce cyan/blue in shadows with Color Grading or HSL) while keeping neutrals neutral
improvements_detailed.reason: The image reads cool/blue, which flattens skin tones and concrete; a small warm shift improves realism and subject presence.

improvements_detailed.action: Crop/straighten to strengthen composition: trim some top background and right edge to reduce distraction, keep the flag and workers as the primary visual anchors, and ensure verticals feel intentional
improvements_detailed.reason: The busy high-rise background competes with the subjects; a tighter crop improves storytelling and reduces visual clutter.

improvements_detailed.action: Apply selective sharpening/texture on the workers only (masking): add slight Texture/Clarity (+5 to +15) and sharpening with masking, while keeping the background smoother
improvements_detailed.reason: Directs attention to the human elements and avoids amplifying artifacts in the already busy, compressed background.
